content: row 6 chain 1 turn 2scinc in the first stitch single_crochet in each of the next 4 stitches *2hdcinc half_double_crochet in each of the next 4 stitches * twice 2scinc in the next stitch single_crochet each of the last 4 stitches 24 change to red yarn row 7 chain 1 turn 2scinc in the first stitch single_crochet in each of the next 5 stitches *2hdcinc half_double_crochet in each of the next 5 stitches * twice 2scinc in the next stitch single_crochet each of the last 5 stitches 28 end- cut yarn leaving a 20 inch yarn tail and pull thru last stitch you will use this yarn tail to sew the rainbow patch to the body piece first arrange the rainbow at the body so that the flat portion aligns with the sewn edge of the body with yarn tail sew all along the rainbow to secure trans patch start with light blue yarn chain 2 row 1 in the 2nd chain from hook make 4 single_crochet stitches 4 row 2 chain 1 turn 2scinc in the first stitch 2hdcinc in each of the next 2 stitches 2scinc in the last stitch 8 change to pink yarn row 3 chain 1 turn 2scinc in the first stitch single_crochet the next stitch *2hdcinc half_double_crochet the next stitch * twice 2scinc in the next stitch single_crochet the last stitch 12 change to white yarn row 4 chain 1 turn 2scinc in the first stitch single_crochet in each of the next 2 stitches *2hdcinc half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 stitches * twice 2scinc in the next stitch single_crochet each of the last 2 stitches 16 change to pink yarn 3 row 5 chain 1 turn 2scinc in the first stitch single_crochet in each of the next 3 stitches *2hdcinc half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 stitches * twice 2scinc in the next stitch single_crochet each of the last 3 stitches 20 change to light blue yarn end- cut yarn leaving a 20 inch yarn tail and pull thru last stitch you will use this yarn tail to sew the patch to the body piece first arrange the patch at the body so that the flat portion aligns with the sewn edge of the body with yarn tail sew all along the patch to secure non-binary patch start with black yarn chain 2 row 1 in the 2nd chain from hook make 4 single_crochet stitches 4 row 2 chain 1 turn 2scinc in the first stitch 2hdcinc in each of the next 2 stitches 2scinc in the last stitch 8 change to purple yarn row 3 chain 1 turn 2scinc in the first stitch single_crochet the next stitch *2hdcinc half_double_crochet the next stitch * twice 2scinc in the next stitch single_crochet the last stitch 12 row 4 chain 1 turn 2scinc in the first stitch single_crochet in each of the next 2 stitches *2hdcinc half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 stitches * twice 2scinc in the next stitch single_crochet each
